SEARCH
Package ru.nsu.odnostorontseva.bj

Class Person

java.lang.Object
ru.nsu.odnostorontseva.bj.Person
Direct Known Subclasses:
Dealer, Player
public abstract class Person extends Object
representing a player in a game. Provides common methods and properties for all players, including hand, role, and actions such as scoring, showing a hand and taking a card.

      Parameters:
      deck - (колода).
      discard - (сброшенные карты).
